The exiled kalphite marauder is a monster found within the Exiled Kalphite Hive. They are stronger versions of Exiled kalphite paragons; both attack with magic and lack non-exiled counterparts in the Kalphite Hive. They also protect the Kalphite King and the Exiled Kalphite Queen from invaders. These are an excellent source of blue and crimson charms. Players looking for blue charms should try fighting this monster or its guardian brethren.

Their attacks also lower the duration of Antipoisons. This is random and a message Your immunity to poison has been worn away slightly by your opponent appears when their attack would have inflicted poison otherwise. However, the damage inflicted by their poison is miniscule and can be easily ignored.

Locations[edit | edit source]

Location Levels Members Requirements Spawns Map
Exiled Kalphite Hive98None9Maplink

Exiled kalphite guardians have very similar drops and count for the same Slayer task, and both guardians and marauders are quite weak for their level. High level players may opt to attune a boss portal to the Exiled Kalphite Queen. This would take them straight to a chamber full of both.

This monster has access to the rare drop table.
Luck-enhancing items are not required to access the table, but they will increase the chance of accessing the rare drop table and may also improve the loot received from it.
